physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a bird's-eye view of Singapore Harbour and the roads adjacent to it. There are numerous boats in the harbour, as well as bigger ships further in the background. There are a number of vehicles, such as cars, trucks, and motorcycles, which are parked or in operation.
title_text: Harbour Area, Singapore Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: harbours boats watercraft street scenes land vehicles
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Harbours Boats and boating Bodies of water Vehicles
